title: Mental Disorders Detection in the Era of Large Language Models
details: G Kuzmin, P Strepetov, M Stankevich, I Smirnov… - arXiv preprint arXiv …, 2024
abstract: This paper compares the effectiveness of traditional machine learning methods, encoder-based models, and large language models (LLMs) on the task of detecting depression and anxiety. Five datasets were considered, each differing in format and …
